description: This layer contains the footprints of bathymetric surveys of shipwrecks performed by VLIZ in the period 2012-2018 in the Belgian part of the North Sea. The bathymetric data gathered during these surveys is available for download in the Marine Data Archive (mda.vliz.be). For more information on the data acquisition, contact infrastructuur@vliz.be. For access to MDA, contact data@vliz.be.
name: Footprints bathymetric surveys wrecks VLIZ (Belgian part of North Sea, 2012-2018)
